description: The Reference ID of the Student ID Data Load header instance

StudentObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

StudentObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

StudentObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Student_and_Universal_ID_Data.description: The Student who is being Referenced.

Universal_IdentifierObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Universal_IdentifierObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Universal_IdentifierObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Student_and_Universal_ID_Data.description: Universal ID of the Student who is being Referenced.

Student_ID_HV_Data.description: Reference to Student using Student or Universal ID

validation.validation: Submit either a Universal ID or Student Reference for the same student.
The specified student has been merged with another student record. Specify the merged student instead.

description: The high-volume data element for the Import Student IDs web service task
